title: preview-only write plan
session_goal: preview write operations without applying any filesystem changes

inputs.content: Preview-only sample file\nNo apply step is executed.\n

steps.title: Preview patch for a new file

inputs.patch:
diff --git a/notes/preview_patch_example.txt b/notes/preview_patch_example.txt
new file mode 100644
--- /dev/null
+++ b/notes/preview_patch_example.txt
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+Preview-only patch example
+No file is written when mode is preview.
+calt practical sample
